name: LOVEY ♡ DOVEY
description:
LOVEY ♡ DOVEY



You've always been super into toilets. You use them so many times a day that you could be considered a #1 toilet fan. That's why you decide to visit an abandoned toilet factory. Legend has it that there are 69 golden toilets there - and obviously, you want them all!



However, Lovey Dovey (the toilet factory's mascot) is on the loose. Sadly, the only thing you brought is a rocket launcher. Hopefully it can come in handy somehow.



Collect all 69 golden toilets and escape - but can you evade the infamous and hairy-legged Lovey Dovey?

KEY ♡ FEATURES


♥ Average playtime of 20 minutes

♥ Collect the 69 golden toilets of which the legends have spoken

♥ Use your nifty rocket launcher

♥ Escape Lovey Dovey & the toilet factory



Elevate your horror game experience and try Lovey Dovey today! This very high-quality comedy horror game will not flush your expectations down the drain!
